description:
Chishio and her partner Atsuki pretended to be participants of the fake Pokémon Hustle event that was created by Team Rocket. Team Rocket`s plan was to steal the Poke balls but they were stolen by Atsuki and Chishio before they could complete their plan.
Team Rocket eventually found out that the Poke balls were stolen but Officer Jenny was already following Atsuki and Chishio undercover when she attempted to capture them. Jessie, James and Meowth thought Atsuki and Chishio were members of Team Rocket as well and helped them with their escape. After Atsuki and Chishio told them they had never even heard of Team Rocket, Jessie, James and Meowth got mad at them and tried to recover the Poké balls.
Atsuki and Chishio were later captured and arrested by Officer Jenny with the help of Ash and his friends.
name: Chishio
